item.title: The UAE has a concentrated ultra high net worth population in Abu Dhabi and Dubai
item.description:
The UAE is home to 1,275 ultra wealthy individuals, comprising 20% of the ultra wealthy population in the Middle East, according to Wealth-X. These individuals hold a combined wealth of US$255 billion. The study also found that 57% of the UAE’s ultra high net worth (UHNW*) population built their wealth through entrepreneurship. Inheritance was a less significant factor, with only 8% inheriting their entire fortune and 35% partially inheriting and subsequently growing their wealth...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-uae-has-a-concentrated-ultra-high-net-worth-population-in-abu-dhabi-and-dubai/
